sentences.en: " Perhaps I can introduce Mr. Lake Kirby , an emeritus professor from Washington University ? "
sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍华盛顿大学名誉教授 莱克柯尔比 先生.

sentences.en: Have multi - functional to keep fit and recover room, activity room, read room, emeritus all available rooms.
sentences.cn: 有多功能健身康复室 、 动室 、 读室 、 誉室一应俱全.

sentences.en: He will continue as chairman emeritus.
sentences.cn: 他将会继续担任荣誉主席。

sentences.en: He will receive the title of a professor emeritus tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他明天将接受这个退休名义教授的称号.

sentences.en: Her son took the Astor seat in 1986 and subsequently became an emeritus trustee as well.
sentences.cn: 1986年,她的儿子坐上了她的位子,之后也成了名誉董事.

sentences.en: I am to disapprove of those who defer emeritus age.
sentences.cn: 我是不赞成推迟退休年龄的.

sentences.en: If Steve is done bad, bill also won't be at ease emeritus.
sentences.cn: 假如史蒂夫做的不好, 比尔也不会放心退休.

sentences.en: Is the cadre emeritus are pay and worker retired does pay differ big?
sentences.cn: 干部退休待遇与工人退休待遇相差大 吗 ?

sentences.en: John Seely Brown is director emeritus of Xerox PARC and a visiting scholar at USC.
sentences.cn: 约翰·斯里·布朗是XeroxPARC的荣誉董事,也是USC的访问学者.

sentences.en: One of its two authors is Professor Emeritus Frank Press.
sentences.cn: 普雷斯教授是此书的两位作者之一.

sentences.en: Perhaps I could introduce Mr Lake Kirby , an emeritus professor from Washington University?
sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍华盛顿大学名誉教授 莱克·柯尔比 先生.

sentences.en: Professor Emeritus of Computers and Information Systems at the Faculty of Management, Tel Aviv University.
sentences.cn: 特拉维夫大学管理学计算机与信息系统名誉教授.

sentences.en: Tang Tsou was Homer J . Livingston Professor Emeritus in Political Science at the University of Chicago.
sentences.cn: 邹谠是芝加哥大学霍默·J · 利文斯顿政治学荣誉退休教授.
荣誉退休的生物学教授

phrases.tran_cn: 名誉教授；荣誉教授；荣誉退休教授

trans.tran_en: Emeritus is used with a professional title to indicate that the person bearing it has retired but keeps the title as an honour
